name: $error
desc: The resource describes an action or plan that is proposed, and not yet approved by the participants

name: $proposed
desc: The resource describes a course of action that is planned and agreed/approved, but at the time of recording was still future

name: $planned
desc: The information in the resource is still being prepared and edited

name: $draft
desc: A fulfiller has been asked to perform this action, but it has not yet occurred

name: $requested
desc: The fulfiller has received the request, but not yet agreed to carry out the action

name: $received
desc: The fulfiller chose not to perform the action

name: $declined
desc: The fulfiller has decided to perform the action, and plans are in train to do this in the future

name: $accepted
desc: The pre-conditions for the action are all fulfilled, and it is imminent

name: $arrived
desc: The resource describes information that is currently valid or a process that is presently occuring

name: $active
desc: The process described/requested in this resource has been halted for some reason

name: $suspended
desc: The process described/requested in the resource could not be completed, and no further action is planned

name: $failed
desc: The information in this resource has been replaced by information in another resource

name: $replaced
desc: The process described/requested in the resource has been completed, and no further action is planned

name: $complete
desc: The resource describes information that is no longer valid or a process that is stopped occurring

name: $inactive
desc: The process described/requested in the resource did not complete - usually due to some workflow error, and no further action is planned

name: $abandoned
desc: Authoring system does not know the status

name: $unknown
desc: The information in this resource is not yet approved

name: $unconfirmed
desc: The information in this resource is approved

name: $confirmed
desc: The issue identified by this resource is no longer of concern

name: $resolved
desc: This information has been ruled out by testing and evaluation

name: $refuted
desc: Potentially true?

name: $differential
desc: This information is still being assembled

name: $partial
desc: not available at this time/location

name: $busy-unavailable
desc: Free for scheduling

name: $free
desc: Ready to act

name: $on-target
desc: Ahead of the planned timelines

name: $behind-target
desc: Behind the planned timelines

name: $not-ready
desc: The device transducer is disconnected

name: $transduc-discon
desc: The hardware is disconnected
